string.value: Lana wants you to request a new song from a genius composer? Maestro Rho is not only known for his talents but is also infamous for his arrogance. Oh well, gotta do what you gotta do. Go talk to #bMaestro Rho#k and request a new song.
Destroy the Cheap Amplifiers and find Maestro Rho's lost MP3 player. Follow the sound coming from the 7th-8th floor to where #bJune#k is on duty.

When you found the MP3 player and returned it to Maestro Rho, he said he wanted to listen to some music before helping you. How rude! But this is for Blake, so you should ask him again... And try to be nice.

Ahhhh! Too loud! Too loud! Someone turn that off! The garbage blasting out of those Cheap Speakers... Ahhh! It's torture on my ears! \r\n#L0##bHe...Hello. I'm here to ask if you'd be willing to write a new song for B...Blake...#l\n#k
I won't talk to anyone until that noise is turned off! Turn that thing off, I say!

Too loud! That noise from the Cheap Amplifiers! Get to that music shop on the 7th-8th floor and get rid of the Cheap Amplifiers! And bring back the #bLatest Model MP3#k I left behind while you're at it. \r\nI dropped it because I couldn't think straight, thanks to the noise from the Cheap Amplifiers! Argh! You'll find it if you destroy about #r50 Cheap Amplifiers#k.
I can't concentrate on what you're saying because it's too noisy!
Oh, isn't that my MP3 player? Here, let me have it.
Phew, I think I'll live. The racket from the Cheap Amplifiers has settled down. So, what were you saying? Something about Blake...? But hold that thought. I have to listen to my MP3 first.
Go over to the music shop on the 7th-8th floor and destroy #r50 Cheap Amplifiers#k and bring me my #bLatest Model MP3#k! Argh, ahhhh!
Go over to the music shop on the 7th-8th floor and destroy #r50 Cheap Amplifiers#k and bring me my #bLatest Model MP3#k! Argh, ahhhh!
